|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;THGBMBG5D1KBAIT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L6445EM2I-10G; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646F-BYK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32 |oui = 00:11:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = WPA3, Wave2, MU-MIMO, SD Card slot, DFS, OWE, |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier;RFMD;PA5542;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/09/2016 |estreldate = 01/07/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833593004 |asin = B01N5MPTG1 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "GTQ01L5", "08-06GTQ0112" and "Rev:V1.2" is silkscreened on the board.
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/YOR-RT2600AC YOR-RT2600AC] (2016-09-09) :Per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3127841 FCC Doc] - "1620" (05/2016) is manuf. date devices.
*{{WiFiCert|WFA63130|10/05/2018}} (WPA3 Support) :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065/QCA9984(5) - AP161 *[https://www.synology.com/ru-ru/releaseNote/RT2600ac ''Synology RT2600ac'' Release Notes - v1.2-7742] (2018-10-16) :Added support for WPA3 Personal/Enterprise :security encryption on RT2600ac and MR2200ac. :Added support for Wi-Fi Enhanced Open (OWE) :security encryption on RT2600ac and MR2200ac.
{{See also|Synology MR2200ac|Synology RT1900ac}}
===Specifications=== *Powerful 1.7 GHz dual-core processor boosts performance *Memory: 4GB (eMMC), 8MB (SPI) flash and 512MB (DDR3) RAM *Get ultimate Wi-Fi speeds-up to 2.53Gbps (1733+800Mbps) *Quad-Stream technology delivers Wi-Fi to multiple devices *Next generation Wave2 Wi-Fi - 160 MHz, MU-MIMO, Quad-stream *Four high-performance external antennas deliver maximum range *Twin USB ports offer high-speed, USB storage-ready access :One USB 2.0 port on the back and one USB 3.0 port on the side
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.synology.com/en-global/company/news/article/Visit_Synology_at_Computex_2016 ''Visit Synology at Computex 2016'' - Press release on '''Synology'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32848-synology-formally-announces-its-wireless-router ''Synology Formally Announces Its Wireless Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.techbang.com/posts/43836-advanced-flash-storage-array-market-synology-foot-appeared-next-generation-wireless-router-rt2600ac ''Synology RT2600ac'' on '''Techbang'''] (Computex 2016)
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33075-synology-rt2600ac-router-reviewed ''Synology RT2600ac Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/synology-rt2600ac-review ''Synology RT2600ac review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.shadowandy.net/2017/01/synology-router-rt2600ac-review.htm ''Synology RT2600ac reviews'' on '''ShadowAndy'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/pozostale/synology_rt2600ac/ ''Synology RT2600ac review'' on '''Openitforum'''] *[http://www.sajdyk.pl/2017/01/synology-rt2600ac-podstawowy-opis-testy.html ''Synology RT2600ac review'' on '''Zapiski Admina'''] *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8154/synology-rt2600ac-wireless-router-review/index.html ''Synology RT2600ac review'' on '''TweakTown''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.synology.com/enu/viewtopic.php?f=262&t=118974 ''New Router Synology RT2600ac'' on '''Synology''' forums] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/synology-reveals-its-rt2600ac-router-at-computex.32876/ ''Synology reveals its RT2600ac router at Computex'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/tech-news-synology-announces-new-rt2600ac-router-computex-2016 ''Synology announces new RT2600ac router'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums] *[http://www.mobile01.com/newsdetail/18781/computex-2016-synology-rt2600ac-nas-ds416-play ''Synology RT2600ac'' on '''Mobile01''' forums] (Computex 2016) *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1407-synology-router-rt2600ac/ ''Synology RT2600ac'' on '''OpenITforum''' forums] *[http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/2456071 ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''WhirlPool''' forums]
